data_source.reference: D.S.Leonard et al., Nucl. Instr. and Meth. A 591 (2008) (10.1016/j.nima.2008.03.001)

sample.description: 0.01 thick phosphor-bronze for APD spiders from E. Jordan Brooks.
sample.name: Phosphor-bronze, E. Jordan Brooks

measurement.description: For each of K, Th, and U, natural terrestrial abundance ratios were used to cover from isotopic to total elemental abundances.
